___fileListing.description: Extract widget information from a file listing.

___applicationUrl.description: The url of the application with the widgets. Default is the application in which the activity is included.

___list.description: A list with json files which contain information about used widgets.

___widgetListing.description: Provide a list of available widgets and activities as a resource.

name: widget-listing-activity
description: Reads a file listing and extracts information on available widgets and activities.
